thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 11 of 539
thread.title: Florence Baranek

author: Florence Baranek
title: Florence Baranek
text: We ordered a gown for my daughter a gown for Prom, we ordered a 2x. She wears a 2x from all the other stores we deal with, but this 2x is actually a size 14. I called Prom Girl within 15 minutes of delivery to get return authorization. I was told that I will only get credit I am not happy with that as they have very little in a true 2x. I will not be dealing with them again. Please realize that you must check your measurements of each and every dress as they all are different. A 2x in one will not fit a 2x in another.
